headline: Is Deckers Outdoor (DECK) Still Reasonably Priced After Its Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Deckers Outdoor is still priced sensibly after its long run as a footwear favorite, this article will walk through what the current share price might be implying about value. The stock last closed at US$115.36, with returns of 2.8% over 7 days, 13.3% over 30 days, 8.0% year to date, 25.1% decline over 1 year and 66.6% and 113.9% over 3 and 5 years respectively. This performance may have shifted how investors see both its growth potential and risk. Recent coverage...
